title: Millet flour as a potential ingredient in fish sausage for health and sustainability
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00067F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Krishnamoorthy Elavarasan, Mathew Malini, George Ninan, C. N. Ravishankar, B. R. Dayakar
A sustainable food product, ‘Fish-millet sausage’, suitable for nutritional intervention programs to achieve SDG-2 was developed using 9 varieties of millet. Millet-added sausages had better textural and sensory acceptability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
